org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp.diff

Class DifferentialCache<K extends Cell>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp.diff.DifferentialCache<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - 

    public class DifferentialCache<K extends Cell>
extends java.lang.Object
    a differential cache of Cell instances which can update in batches of ids.
    This class makes a difference between having cells of a given id and having information about cells of a given id.
    In particular, it is possible (and it does happen) to have information about a given id without having any cells with that id. The following states are distinct:
    • the fact that cellsByOwner[i] is an empty list means that the backing store has no cells with the given id
    • the fact that cellsByOwner[i] is missing (null) means that the cache has no information regarding the cells with the given id
    These 2 are semantically different and this is important when, for example, refetching data from the backing store.
    This class is thread-safe
